name: get_current_date_time
summary: Retrieves the current date and time as a string in the standard "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" format.
description: This function fetches the current date and time and formats it as a string in the international standard date and time notation "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS". It can be implemented in a variety of situations where time stamping is needed such as event logging, creation of time-based unique identifiers, or tracking the execution duration of certain tasks.

return_value.description: A string representation of the current date and time in "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS" format.
